languages.text: Одно из возможных свойств посоха навигатора, всегда имеющее после себя цифровое значение (например, насыщение 10). Союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} ко всем характеристикам, равные значению насыщения, до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.
languages.original_text: Одно из возможных свойств посоха навигатора, всегда имеющее после себя цифровое значение (например, насыщение 10). Союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} ко всем характеристикам, равные значению насыщения, до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора.

traits.locale_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff that is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff that is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

languages.text: Einer der möglichen Parameter eines Navigatorstabs. Es folgt immer ein numerischer Wert (beispielsweise Durchtränkung 10). Verbündete, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} auf alle ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, und zwar entsprechend des Parameters Durchtränkung. Dieser Bonus wird aufaddiert und bei jeder Aufaddierung bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Einer der möglichen Parameter eines Navigatorstabs. Es folgt immer ein numerischer Wert (beispielsweise Durchtränkung 10). Verbündete, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} auf alle ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, und zwar entsprechend des Parameters Durchtränkung. Dieser Bonus wird aufaddiert und bei jeder Aufaddierung bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert.

Einer der möglichen Parameter eines Navigatorstabs. Es folgt immer ein numerischer Wert (beispielsweise Durchtränkung 10). Verbündete, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} auf alle ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, und zwar entsprechend des Parameters Durchtränkung. Dieser Bonus wird aufaddiert und bei jeder Aufaddierung bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert.

languages.text: L'un des paramètres possibles d'un bâton de navigateur. Il est toujours suivi d'une valeur numérique, par exemple Infusion 10. Des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} équivalant à la valeur du paramètre Infusion s'appliquent à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des alliés ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de celui-ci. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: L'un des paramètres possibles d'un bâton de navigateur. Il est toujours suivi d'une valeur numérique, par exemple Infusion 10. Des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} équivalant à la valeur du paramètre Infusion s'appliquent à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des alliés ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de celui-ci. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur.

L'un des paramètres possibles d'un bâton de navigateur. Il est toujours suivi d'une valeur numérique, par exemple Infusion 10. Des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} équivalant à la valeur du paramètre Infusion s'appliquent à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des alliés ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de celui-ci. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur.

languages.text: Uno de los posibles parámetros de un báculo de navegante. Siempre viene seguido de un valor numérico (por ejemplo, Infusión 10). Los aliados que son objetivo de un poder del navegante ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a todas sus características igual al parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}infusión{/g} hasta el fin del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: Uno de los posibles parámetros de un báculo de navegante. Siempre viene seguido de un valor numérico (por ejemplo, Infusión 10). Los aliados que son objetivo de un poder del navegante ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a todas sus características igual al parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}infusión{/g} hasta el fin del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica.

languages.text: 航宙士の杖に付属可能なパラメータの1つ。常に数値が続く（例：注入 10）。航宙士の力のターゲットとなった味方は、航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで続く、全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対して、注入のパラメータと同等の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。このボーナスは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士の杖に付属可能なパラメータの1つ。常に数値が続く（例：注入 10）。航宙士の力のターゲットとなった味方は、航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで続く、全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}に対して、注入のパラメータと同等の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。このボーナスは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。

languages.text: 导航者法杖可能包含的其中一项属性值，此属性带有强度数值（如“灌注10”）。受导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都会提高，等同于灌注属性值，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.

traits.locale_text: 导航者法杖可能包含的其中一项属性值，此属性带有强度数值（如“灌注10”）。受导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都会提高，等同于灌注属性值，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。

languages.text: Rotacı asalarının muhtemel parametrelerinden biri. Bu parametreyi her zaman sayısal bir değer takip eder (örneğin aşılayıcı 10). Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı dost birimler, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} aşılayıcı parametresine eşit miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Bu bonus üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar.
languages.original_text: One of the possible parameters of a Navigator's staff. It is always followed by a numerical value (for example, infusing 10). Allies that become targets of the Navigator's powers gain {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} equal to the infusing parameter, which lasts until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks.
